Discover your path, secure your future...
Summer is fast approaching and you you may be thinking ahead to life beyond exams. Whether you are looking ahead to University, ready to enter the world of work, or still unsure, Step Forward will help you get experience to get ahead.
What is Step Forward?
Step Forward is a London based programme which provides school and college leavers with a chance to spend a year in the world of work with a top quality employer.
As a Step Forward Associate, you’ll get:
Invaluable experience with great employers £9000 paid salary Professional Development training to equip you with the essential skills Fantastic training and a nationally recognised qualification The advice and support of a trained mentor Professional network of contacts for the future
What could I be doing?
Accounting - Are you looking to be next top CEO in London? A foundation in this area could be your next step. Develop accounting skills and knowledge that are applicable to a wide range of jobs in the Finance sector.
Business Support Services - Keen to set up your own business? Want to gain experience in a business? This role provides you with a great knowledge of office based jobs that support businesses. Whether thats with a small start up company, or a huge international FTSE 100, gain an overview of roles in this career.
Working with Children - Develop practical skills and experience fworking with 0-5 years old in a nursery. If you're interested a people related profession, this is a great first step. IT, Software and Web Development - Great for those who are already interested in all things IT, and want to improve technical skills and knowledge that are applicable to a wide range of jobs in the IT sector. Social Media and Digital Marketing - Great for those who are interested in learning about the impact and power of social media and digital marketing. How do I apply? We know that you've been busy with exams but it's always important to keep your options open. Our application form takes just 10 minutes so take a break and secure your future. We have limited spaces available for the 2015 programme so make sure you apply as soon as possible.
Apply now at WWW.STEPFORWARD.UK.COM
